mapper.select: select ROOM_NO , ROOM_NAME , ROOM_TYPE , CREATE_DATETIME , CREATE_USER , STATUS from T_CHAT_ROOM where ROOM_NO IN ( SELECT ROOM_NO FROM T_USER_CHAT_ROOM WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND JOIN_YN = 'Y' )
select ROOM_NO , ROOM_NAME , ROOM_TYPE , CREATE_DATETIME , CREATE_USER , STATUS from T_CHAT_ROOM where ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
select COUNT(*) from T_USER_CHAT_ROOM where ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} and JOIN_YN = 'Y'
select USER_NO , USER_NAME , ROOM_NO , JOIN_TIME , JOIN_YN from T_USER_CHAT_ROOM join T_USER USING (USER_NO) where ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} and JOIN_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into T_CHAT_ROOM ( ROOM_NO , ROOM_NAME , ROOM_TYPE , CREATE_DATETIME , CREATE_USER , STATUS ) values ( LPAD(SEQ_CHNO.NEXTVAL, 4, '0') , #{title} , #{type} , SYSDATE , #{createUser} , 'Y' )
insert into T_USER_CHAT_ROOM ( USER_NO , ROOM_NO , JOIN_TIME , JOIN_YN ) values ( #{userNo} , LPAD(SEQ_CHNO.CURRVAL, 4, '0') , SYSDATE , 'Y' )
mapper.select: select MSG_NO , MSG_CONTENT , USER_NO , USER_NAME , ROOM_NO , MSG_TYPE , CREATE_DATETIME , STATUS from T_MESSAGE join T_USER USING (USER_NO) where ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} and STATUS = 'Y' order by CREATE_DATETIME
mapper.insert: insert into T_MESSAGE ( MSG_NO , MSG_CONTENT , USER_NO , ROOM_NO , MSG_TYPE , CREATE_DATETIME , STATUS ) values ( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL , #{message} , #{userNo} , #{roomNo} , #{msgType} , TO_DATE(#{nowWithSeconds}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , 'Y' )
insert into T_MESSAGE_READ ( USER_NO , MSG_NO ) values ( #{targetUserNo} , SEQ_MNO.CURRVAL )
mapper.select: select USER_NO , ROOM_NO , JOIN_TIME , JOIN_YN from T_USER_CHAT_ROOM where ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} and USER_NO = #{userNo} and JOIN_YN = 'Y'

SELECT MSG_NO , MSG_CONTENT , USER_NO , ROOM_NO , MSG_TYPE , CREATE_DATETIME , STATUS FROM ( SELECT MSG_NO, MSG_CONTENT, USER_NO, ROOM_NO, MSG_TYPE, CREATE_DATETIME, STATUS, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ROOM_NO ORDER BY CREATE_DATETIME DESC) AS RN FROM T_MESSAGE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ) WHERE RN = 1
